title: AT&T Mobility LLC v. Concepcion
court: Supreme Court of the United States
summary: The Court held the FAA preempts California's Discover Bank rule; class-action waivers in arbitration agreements are enforceable.
plain_text: Holding: The Federal Arbitration Act preempts state rules invalidating classwide-arbitration waivers; agreements must be enforced as written.

title: Riley v. California
court: Supreme Court of the United States
summary: Police generally may not, without a warrant, search digital information on a cellphone seized incident to arrest.
plain_text: Holding: Warrantless searches of digital contents of a cellphone seized during an arrest violate the Fourth Amendment.

title: Epic Games, Inc. v. Apple, Inc.
court: U.S. Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit
